mapper.select:
SELECT /*WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.getRegisterCompanyList*/ * FROM ( SELECT D.* , ( SELECT rsume_stts_cd FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl card WHERE card.appctn_seq = D.appctn_seq AND card.rsume_ord = D.rsumeOrd) rsume_stts_cd, ( SELECT (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = mng_stts_cd) as mng_stts_cd_nm FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl card WHERE card.appctn_seq = D.appctn_seq AND card.rsume_ord = D.rsumeOrd) mng_stts_cd, ( SELECT appctn_stts_chng_dtm FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl card WHERE card.appctn_seq = D.appctn_seq AND card.rsume_ord = D.rsumeOrd) appctn_stts_chng_dtm, ( SELECT mng_stts_chng_dtm FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl card WHERE card.appctn_seq = D.appctn_seq AND card.rsume_ord = D.rsumeOrd) mng_stts_chng_dtm FROM ( SELECT YEAR(A.year) as year, A.episd, B.appctn_seq, B.sbrdn_bsnm_no, B.reg_id, B.reg_dtm, B.mod_id, B.mod_dtm, (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = B.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = B.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME, C.*, (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = C.ctgry_cd) as ctgry_cd_nm, (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = C.size_cd) as size_cd_nm, (SELECT MAX(rsume_ord) FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl WHERE appctn_seq = B.appctn_seq) rsumeOrd FROM ( SELECT * FROM cx_episd_mst WHERE bsn_cd = 'INQ07009' ) A INNER JOIN cx_appctn_mst B ON B.episd_seq = A.episd_seq INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.mem_seq, a.name, a.id, a.hp_no, a.email, b.cmpn_nm, b.ctgry_cd, b.size_cd, b.bsnm_no, b.rprsnt_nm ,b.stbsm_dt, b.zipcode, b.bsc_addr, b.dtl_addr, b.sls_pmt, DATE_FORMAT(b.sls_year,'%Y') AS sls_year, b.mple_cnt, b.mjr_prdct_1, b.mjr_prdct_2, b.mjr_prdct_3 FROM co_mem_mst a INNER JOIN cp_cmpn_mst b ON a.work_bsnm_no = b.bsnm_no ) C /* 회원-회사 JOIN 테이블 */ ON C.mem_seq = B.mem_seq ) D ) F
ORDER BY year DESC, episd DESC, reg_dtm desc LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT /*WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.getRegisterCompanyCount*/ count(*) FROM ( SELECT D.* , ( SELECT rsume_stts_cd FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl card WHERE card.appctn_seq = D.appctn_seq AND card.rsume_ord = D.rsumeOrd) rsume_stts_cd, ( SELECT mng_stts_cd FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl card WHERE card.appctn_seq = D.appctn_seq AND card.rsume_ord = D.rsumeOrd) mng_stts_cd, ( SELECT appctn_stts_chng_dtm FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl card WHERE card.appctn_seq = D.appctn_seq AND card.rsume_ord = D.rsumeOrd) appctn_stts_chng_dtm, ( SELECT mng_stts_chng_dtm FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl card WHERE card.appctn_seq = D.appctn_seq AND card.rsume_ord = D.rsumeOrd) mng_stts_chng_dtm FROM ( SELECT YEAR(A.year) as year, A.episd, B.appctn_seq, B.sbrdn_bsnm_no, B.reg_id, B.reg_dtm, B.mod_dtm, C.*, (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = C.ctgry_cd) as ctgry_cd_nm, (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = C.size_cd) as size_cd_nm, (SELECT MAX(rsume_ord) FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl WHERE appctn_seq = B.appctn_seq) rsumeOrd FROM ( SELECT * FROM cx_episd_mst WHERE bsn_cd = 'INQ07009' ) A INNER JOIN cx_appctn_mst B ON B.episd_seq = A.episd_seq INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.mem_seq, a.name, a.id, a.hp_no, a.email, b.cmpn_nm, b.ctgry_cd, b.size_cd, b.bsnm_no FROM co_mem_mst a INNER JOIN cp_cmpn_mst b ON a.work_bsnm_no = b.bsnm_no ) C /* 회원-회사 JOIN 테이블 */ ON C.mem_seq = B.mem_seq ) D ) F
SELECT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.getOptYearList */ DISTINCT YEAR(year) FROM cx_episd_mst WHERE bsn_cd = #{bsnCd} ORDER BY year ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.putAppctnMst */ INTO cx_appctn_mst ( appctn_seq, episd_seq, mem_seq, appctn_bsnm_no, sbrdn_bsnm_no, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{appctnSeq}, #{episdSeq}, #{memSeq}, #{bsnmNo}, #{sbrdnBsnmNo}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )

INSERT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.putAppctnFileDtl */ INTO cx_appctn_file_dtl ( appctn_seq, file_cd, file_seq, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{appctnSeq}, #{fileCd}, #{fileSeq}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )

INSERT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.putAppctnRsumeDtl */ INTO cx_appctn_rsume_dtl ( rsume_seq, rsume_ord, appctn_seq, rsume_stts_cd, appctn_stts_cd, appctn_stts_chng_dtm, mng_stts_cd, mng_stts_chng_dtm, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{rsumeSeq}, #{rsumeOrd}, #{appctnSeq}, #{rsumeSttsCd}, #{appctnSttsCd}, now(), #{mngSttsCd}, now(), #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.updCmpnCbsnMst */ cp_cmpn_mst SET ctgry_cd = #{ctgryCd}, size_cd = #{sizeCd}, stbsm_dt = #{stbsmDt}, tel_no = #{compTel}, zipcode = #{zipCode}, bsc_addr = #{bscAddr}, dtl_addr = #{dtlAddr}, sls_pmt = #{slsPmt}, sls_year = #{slsYear}, mple_cnt = #{mpleCnt}, mjr_prdct_1 = #{mjrPrdct1}, mjr_prdct_2 = #{mjrPrdct2}, mjr_prdct_3 = #{mjrPrdct3}, qlty_5_star_cd = #{qlty5StarCd}, qlty_5_star_year = #{qlty5StarYear}, pay_5_star_cd = #{pay5StarCd}, pay_5_star_year = #{pay5StarYear}, tchlg_5_star_cd = #{tchlg5StarCd}, tchlg_5_star_year = #{tchlg5StarYear}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_ip = #{modIp}, mod_dtm = now() WHERE bsnm_no = #{bsnmNo}

UPDATE /*WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.updCoMemMst*/ co_mem_mst SET tel_no = #{telNo}, dept_cd = #{deptCd}, dept_dtl_nm = #{deptDtlNm}, pstn_cd = #{pstnCd}, pstn_nm = #{pstnNm}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_ip = #{modIp}, mod_dtm = now() WHERE mem_seq = #{memSeq} AND id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.insCmpnCbsnDtl */ cp_cmpn_cbsn_dtl ( bsnm_no, cbsn_seq, nm, score, year, crtfn_cmpn_nm, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{bsnCd}, #{cbsnSeq}, #{nm}, #{score}, #{year}, #{crtfnCmpnNm}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )

if.test: strtDt != null and strtDt != ''.toString() and endDt != null and endDt != ''.toString()

when.if: AND ( REG_DTM >= STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') OR REG_DTM <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') )

if.test: strtDt != null and strtDt != ''.toString() and endDt != null and endDt != ''.toString()

when.if: AND ( REG_DTM >= STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') OR REG_DTM <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') )

if.test: strtDt != null and strtDt != ''.toString() and endDt != null and endDt != ''.toString()

when.if: AND ( MOD_DTM >= STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') OR MOD_DTM <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') )

choose.when: AND EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')))
AND EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')))
AND EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')))
AND EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')))
AND EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')))
choose.otherwise: AND ( EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%'))) OR EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%'))) )

mapper.select: SELECT /* WBFBSupplyCompanyMapper.selectSupplyDtl */ C.ID, C.NAME, C.EMAIL, C.DEPT_CD, C.DEPT_DTL_NM, C.PSTN_CD, C.DEPT_DTL_NM, C.PSTN_NM, C.HP_NO, C.TEL_NO, D.YEAR, D.EPISD, A.ADM_MEMO, A.MEM_SEQ, B.*, (SELECT APPCTN_STTS_CD FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = A.APPCTN_SEQ) AS APPCTN_STTS_CD, (SELECT APPCTN_STTS_CHNG_DTM FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = A.APPCTN_SEQ) AS APPCTN_STTS_CHNG_DTM, (SELECT MNG_STTS_CD FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = A.APPCTN_SEQ) AS MNG_STTS_CD, (SELECT MNG_STTS_CHNG_DTM FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = A.APPCTN_SEQ) AS MNG_STTS_CHNG_DTM, (SELECT rtrn_rsn_cntn FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = A.APPCTN_SEQ) AS rtrn_rsn_cntn, (SELECT FILE_SEQ FROM CX_APPCTN_FILE_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = A.APPCTN_SEQ) AS APPCTN_SEQ FROM CX_APPCTN_MST A INNER JOIN CP_CMPN_MST B ON A.APPCTN_BSNM_NO = B.BSNM_NO INNER JOIN CO_MEM_MST C ON A.MEM_SEQ = C.MEM_SEQ INNER JOIN CX_EPISD_MST D ON A.EPISD_SEQ = D.EPISD_SEQ WHERE A.APPCTN_SEQ = #{detailsKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.updAppctnRsumeDtl */ cx_appctn_rsume_dtl SET appctn_stts_cd = #{appctnSttsCd}, appctn_stts_chng_dtm = now(), mng_stts_cd = #{mngSttsCd}, mng_stts_chng_dtm = now(), rtrn_rsn_cntn = #{rtrnRsnCntn}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_ip = #{modIp}, mod_dtm = now() WHERE appctn_seq = #{detailsKey}

UPDATE /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.uptAppctnMst */ cx_appctn_mst SET adm_memo = #{admMemo}, mem_seq = #{memSeq}, appctn_bsnm_no = #{bsnmNo}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_ip = #{modIp}, mod_dtm = now() WHERE appctn_seq = #{detailsKey}
mapper.select: SELECT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.getChangeList */ TRNSF_SEQ, APPCTN_SEQ, BFRE_MEM_SEQ, ( SELECT NAME FROM CO_MEM_MST WHERE MEM_SEQ = BFRE_MEM_SEQ ) BFRE_MEM_NM, ( SELECT ID FROM CO_MEM_MST WHERE MEM_SEQ = BFRE_MEM_SEQ ) BFRE_MEM_ID, AFTR_MEM_SEQ, ( SELECT NAME FROM CO_MEM_MST WHERE MEM_SEQ = AFTR_MEM_SEQ ) AFTR_MEM_NM, ( SELECT ID FROM CO_MEM_MST WHERE MEM_SEQ = AFTR_MEM_SEQ ) AFTR_MEM_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = REG_ID) REG_NAME, REG_ID, REG_IP, REG_DTM FROM CX_APPCTN_TRNSF_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = #{detailsKey} ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC
SELECT /* WBIBSupplyCompanyMapper.getChangeCount */ COUNT(*) FROM CX_APPCTN_TRNSF_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = #{detailsKey}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL
APPCTN_SEQ IN
#{item}
AND MNG_STTS_CD != 'PRO_TYPE06001_02_001'
